PassiveMonster - Class in ShadowQuest
Passive monsters wander around the map randomly by default.

Peasant - Class in ShadowQuest
Villager who gives advice on where to find items.
Peasant(Position, Stats, String, String) - Constructor for class ShadowQuest.Peasant
Constructor to make a new Peasant object.
Player - Class in ShadowQuest
Represents a single player character The player can be controlled by the user and can perform a number of actions: - Move: 2D movement - Attack: Deal damage to all enemies within range - Interact: Interact with all villagers within range - Pickup: Pickup all items within range
Player(Position, Stats, String, String) - Constructor for class ShadowQuest.Player
Constructor to make a new unit object.

Position - Class in ShadowQuest
